buginformation.summary: cli parameter value something misinterpreted parameter
buginformation.description: parameter value passed that contains hyphen the delimited first character cli parses this parameter for example using the call java myclass something results the parser creating the invalid parameter noting that skipping the code using the posix parser follows options options buildcommandlineoptions commandlineparser parser new posixparser commandline commandline null try commandline parser parse options args catch parseexception system out println invalid parameters getmessage new line system exit exit code error this has been tested against the nightly build dated 20050503
